body: Sorry we missed this! We can definitely add an example there. Is that something you'd like to submit a pull request for?

> Is that something you'd like to submit a pull request for?

nope, sorry
@nzakas , I have created and tested a basic example. Here is the screenshot. Would love to give a PR for the same.

issue.title: docs: add example code for eslint.lintText

labels.name: triage
labels.description: An ESLint team member will look at this issue soon

labels.name: archived due to age
labels.description: This issue has been archived; please open a new issue for any further discussion

repository.name: eslint
repository.description: Find and fix problems in your JavaScript code.
